title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2601.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2601.1 - General

State Regulations

The applicant: (a) must have been in existence either as a corporation or as an unincorporated
organized group performing significant neighborhood preservation activities for
at least one year prior to entering into a contract with the
commissioner; (b) shall have
demonstrated by its immediate past and current housing activities that it has
been primarily engaged in, and has the ability to continue to engage in, neighborhood preservation activities within the neighborhood; and
(c) possesses or has the ability to acquire
or gain access to the requisite staff, office facilities, equipment and
expertise to enable it to perform the proposed activities. The office shall be
located within the neighborhood and shall be open during regular business
hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2601.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
